DOC.brief_summary: The study compare meal time glucose control associate BIOD-531 , rapidly absorb concentrated insulin associate Humalog Mix 75/25 Humulin R U-500 .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Postprandial Glucose Control Associated With BIOD-531 vs. Humalog Mix 75/25 vs. Humulin R U-500
DOC.criteria: Age 1865 BMI > 25 kg/m2 Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus HbA1c < 10.0 % Subject use 50200 unit insulin/day Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus History bariatric surgery Corticosteroid therapy Significant cardiovascular major organ disease Females breast feeding pregnant A sexually active person use adequate contraceptive method
